website_summaries.verdict: Despite minor quirks, this charcoal grill offers excellent space and features that deliver nice results for a reasonable price.
pros: In addition to the large cooking area, this grill also features dual zones that allows you to cook different foods at different temps, all at once
Features double doors for fire stoking
Has side shelves and bottom storage
cons: Interior and grates have been known to chip or rust

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste money. It lasts the same as the carbon steel grills
customer_reviews.text: You think you are paying the price of a stainless steel grill, however the parts that actually make contact with the fire are carbon steel so very soon (a year) you will see oxidation and holes everywhere that make you buy a new one. Also is almost impossible to find replacement parts. So do not waste your money, buy the cheap grills and replace them every summer.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Missing so many pieces
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this grill for a Christmas gift and assembled it Christmas Eve. As I laid out all the parts before assembling, I realized there were ALOT of parts missing but had no choice than to go ahead and put it together so it could be given the next day. It was missing one of the charcoal boxes, both handles to raise and lower the charcoal, one wheel, the handle to pull out the ash tray and alot of the screws, nuts, bolts and washers. It came in several boxes within larger boxes and appears a box or two wasn't packed in there. In addition to the missing parts, the lid had 2 dents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work but looks good
customer_reviews.text: Poor engineering if any. Way to many air gaps and good luck trying to control the temp in any meaningful way. With every vent closed the temp runs away with coal only on 1 side. Don't buy it. My Weber worked fine and cost half as much
customer_reviews.author: T. Glennon

customer_reviews.title: Great grill with lots of room to cook on
customer_reviews.text: Great grill with lots of room to cook on. Vents and doors do not go together well so you will need to do some modifications to it in order to stop some of the leaking but overall it is well made gets the job done. Remember this is a grill and not a smoker. Reviews say it cooks hot but that is it's intent. Less fuel will cool it down a bit as will cooking offset should the need arise. It took 30-40 minutes for assembly so it really wasn't bad and can be done with only 1 person although a second helps.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: very disapointed in this product cheap
customer_reviews.text: I had a bbq grillware charcoal grill for over 15 years loved it. The dyna glo is very cheap. It is not a heavy dety charcoal grill. I am very disappointed in the quality of the product. the lid does not close if you push to hard on the handle in bends its not the heavy duty I was looking for. if I would of bought it at a local store I would return it
customer_reviews.author: MELINDA

customer_reviews.title: We love this grill so far
customer_reviews.text: We love this grill so far. I wish the basket was bigger on the bottom though. You may need two Weber chimney coal starters to fill both sides the the grill. If you use starter fluid you should just have a gas grill to begin with. Assembly wasn't very hard. Two people are needed for one or two steps only. Oh and this is great for chicken. You can lower the coals if the grease starts to catch fire.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Inspect closely
customer_reviews.text: Grill was bent and damaged, but shipping box wasn’t - almost like grill was damaged before or during being packaged? I needed the grill the following day so I straightened firebox with ratchet straps and divider wall ears with pliers and a hammer. I did try to notify Dyno Glow via internet but my session quickly timed out and I decided not to try again. Cooked on grill three times since and like it so far. Be ready to assemble - lots of nuts and bolts!
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ grill just a little light in construction
customer_reviews.text: Great BBQ grill just a little light in construction. For example the ash pan is about 2 inches deep and made out of very thin metal. Have to empty it every use and it does no look like it will last long. Also one of the grills cracked after just a couple of uses. Other than that it is very flexible with two independent grills wit variable heat control and extremely efficient - uses almost half the charcoal that other grills use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kenworthy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for grill masters. Perfect upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: I was kinda upset that I wasn't notified upon checkout that this item would come in original packaging. It was also left at my door by UPS, it weighs over 100lbs so I had no choice but to get my husband to help bring it in the house. It spoiled his Christmas surprise but he loves it. He put it together today without any problems and can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Aliche´ K

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: My son is the head chef here and he researched grills and we decided this was the one He loves it and we use it every weekend Sturdy reliable and a great grill Replaced an old broken grill Buy it
customer_reviews.author: ABootthang

customer_reviews.title: Good overall after repairing.
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed to put together and unit was damaged. I had to repair the rear wall where it was bent, most would want to return with the damage. After tweaking lid to fit I do overall like the bbq pit. We have used it a few times and definitely recommend sealing the lid, front doors etc to hold smoke.
customer_reviews.author: kelleymom2twogirls

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Assembled fairly easily. A few pieces had a fit problem, but nothing that I could not handle. I have a smoker that I love, so I use this product just for grilling. So I don't have the issues with temperature control that others have mentioned, but there are plenty of gaps that would allow air exchange and make it difficult to maintain a low-and-slow cook. I am still learning it's quirks, but it gives me the real estate that I need and the ability for two different grill temps, which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: We like the ability to move the cooking area up and ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this BBQ to replace an old one we used for 20 years. It has a lot of features the other one didn't have. We like the ability to move the cooking area up and down closer and further from the coals, and can use both sides of it. Cleans up well, also, as the shelving is coated.
customer_reviews.author: Merilyn

customer_reviews.title: Essential parts are poorly made and deteriorate even with occasional use.
customer_reviews.text: We use this grill a couple of times a month and is covered otherwise. After 18-months, the warmer tray rusted out and had to be removed. The grill plates are all rusting, as are the handles to adjust the firebox heights. The entire firebox mechanism is rather flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Crippen

customer_reviews.title: The grill is perfect. assembled easily
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit I was almost swayed against based on the reviews but took a chance figuring most people will complain because they are typically clueless. This was proven. The grill is perfect. assembled easily, instructions are clear and the pieces fit nicely. Would highly recommend anyone for this grill and also caution to ignore the reviews that arent positive.
customer_reviews.author: Lainie

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Have a 12-inch Phillips screwdriver, a socket nut driver, and a small adjustable wrench handy. Unit took about 2 hours to construct. Heavy. Extremely well packaged, with excellent instructions. A very capable charcoal grill. Like the firebox partition and individually adjustable ember baskets. Only negatives were that the cover is attached with 2 hinges, not a full-length continuous hinge. The interior lift arms are not stainless steel and will rust. I hope it lasts more than 2 years. No place to hang your grilling tools.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good versatile grill/smoker.
customer_reviews.text: With a little tweaking, adjusting and modifying it became a great grill. Had to pound out a couple of dents in the sides near the vents to allow the vents to work properly and the lid hinges had to be adjusted to fit tightly with the bottom. Major nice features are porcelain coated cooking grates, two charcoal baskets (with sides) are ea. adjustable and cast iron doors on the front for stoking the fire without the need to open the top lid.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: As we were putting this grill together it became very clear to us that this grill was damaged in places shipping could not have created. Dents in the cover on all sides so much so that our lid doesnt properly close. The inside of the grill where you place your hardware were all damaged and bent. We were very disappointed in this product that we were so excited to get.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Love the 2 separate grills so I can adjust temperature
customer_reviews.text: Used if over the last few months and had no problems. Love the 2 separate grills so I can adjust temperature. It's hard to find a good charcoal grill - everybody wants to use gas...Real chefs use charcoal :D I recommend to get the Grill Cover as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: grilling and chilling
customer_reviews.text: Love the grill. We have been using now close to a year and we love it+ Its big enough for all of our food and it keeps temperature perfectly We also got the optional Grill Cover....We hope to be using it many years to come
customer_reviews.author: Sunny D Aunt/ It's ShellTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for big cook outs an
customer_reviews.text: Oh man absolutley love, love, love! I cook out at least twice a week. This grill is perfect we have a big family so the size works perfect. And for not so big cookouts you have the option to only use one side. I have owned about 4 grills by far this is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband Father’s Day present and he has been completely happy. He wanted to replace his dual gas and charcoal grill with a charcoal grill. Delivery to my front is the best. He really likes that he can control how close the flame gets to the food by cranking the grates up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R

customer_reviews.title: This is a great grill that my husband loves
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill that my husband loves. It took a couple of hours to put together, but was not overly challenging. All of the parts and features on the grill are sturdy and well constructed. We really enjoy the dual cooking zone capability and multiple vents controlling heat. For the price point this charcoal grill can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: All wrong
customer_reviews.text: This grill was completely welded wrong started to put it together and the bars on the bottom were diagonal and completely unever so the charcoal tray would not fit at all not only that the grill and 2 other dents on it. We did not get a message saying it was here so it was sitting on out lawn for at least a few hours before we saw it, got the message an hour later. Something that expensive should not just be put down and left we were home and awake they should have at least knocked.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Van Ness

customer_reviews.title: Great design but the quality is not there
customer_reviews.text: Great design but the quality is not there. The dual charcoal racks and 4 individual cooking racks make it extremely functional and are great features and it has all the operational features common to charcoal grills, Bought it in Sep 2014 and it lost and took out the divisor and after the second grilling it lost some of the inside finish. I used it until April 2018 when it lost its bottom. It also smells chemical in the first year or so. Pitty for I would rate it 5 were it not for issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW...
customer_reviews.text: First time I ever put a grill together without one single problem. Perfect. works as described. I would recommend this grill if you want charcoal/smoker grill.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: ... time I use it and I think it is fine for the price
customer_reviews.text: I think comfort me every time I use it and I think it is fine for the price. But unfortunately it does not make me feel good when I see the Grill deals at The Home Depot at the same price and much better. It is way too fragile, not of good quality, the concept is good but not the materials is built. My advice: You can find something better at a local store, waiting The Home Depot offers like this [....] $ 299 WOOU.
customer_reviews.author: F. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ
customer_reviews.text: The BBQ is great. Arrived undamaged and I put it together myself. (I'm a girl) after using it a few times, I will say I love the way it cooks! no complaints there. Make sure you remember to empty the tray after each bbq'ing. I have never had stainless steel. It gets dirty and marks fairly easily. Next time, I do like the way it looks, but I would probably go back to the black next time.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Scott

customer_reviews.title: Dyna-Glos customer service was awesome and we got our needed parts to assemble a ...
customer_reviews.text: Weather and life got away from us and we didn't open and assemble the grill for several months after receiving. Low and behold, a dented corner lead to an unbalanced lid and we were upset. We knew it was out of the time period for a return. Amazon and Dyna-Glo both worked with us in getting everything right. Dyna-Glos customer service was awesome and we got our needed parts to assemble a sharp looking grill without any further cost. We are excited to use and happy with all the options and versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this grill !! My son put it together for us on mother's day. That was his gift to me ❤❤ we had a cook out with family and friends. Got a lot of complements on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best grill I have ever owned. I bbq 3-4 times a week and it has absolutely been phenomenal. I have had many Webers and it has absolutely impressed me far more than they ever could. My wife just bought be the smaller version for Christmas and I can’t wait to use it! My next purchase of a grill will be the smoker!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus A Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Quality charcoal BBQ
customer_reviews.text: This product came with the option of purchasing the service of a technician to assemble the bbq. I highly recommend this option. They contact you immediately upon purchase, schedule a date whenever is convenient and do an excellent job. The bbq itself looks great. Haven’t tried it yet, but have seen our friend’s bbq in use and loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Y

customer_reviews.title: Good grill - best one yet
customer_reviews.text: The best feature is the grate for the charcoal. It provides for the best burning of the briquettes that I found found in a charcoal grill yet.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: ... and it made it through the shipping process just fine. It is well packaged
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the grill wondering how shipping was going to handle it and it made it through the shipping process just fine. It is well packaged. For my use, it will meet all my grilling requirements, I'm a simple griller, throw steaks, chicken or kabobs on the grill and munch! I've heard it can't stand up to cooking a brisket though because of airflow through gaps in the construction. I have not tested that part myself, but if you just want to have a fun backyard bbq it will last and it is attractive as well.
customer_reviews.author: RhoLov

customer_reviews.title: Product Quality and Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Product was difficult to assemble and is design with very cheap parts. After I assemble it, realize it was damage and lid lost its alignment as the result. I decided to keep it as sending it back is much more painful. I will try to make a best use and probably will give it to my gardener or whoever is interested.
customer_reviews.author: Aqill

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last.
customer_reviews.text: If you use the grill on average once a week, this grill will not last you 1 year. Even with a grill cover the backside (which is not stainless steel) rusts out fairly quickly. Since this supports the lid... Now , the front and other stainless steel parts lol great!!
customer_reviews.author: Why

customer_reviews.title: Love the ability to raised and lower the charcoal pans ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving it so far! Love the ability to raised and lower the charcoal pans and to make two different levels of heat. I also love the doors in the front that allow me to tend the fire without opening the lid and losing heat. The pull out ash tray is a very nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: John Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Good grill for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this grill for the entire season and it does a pretty good job. The quality of the material isn't the best and the lid doesn't quite fit as tight as it could (which causes some discoloring of the top from the smoke), however, it is adequate for the amount of money I paid. The grill was easy to put together and I haven't had any real issues. After a full season of use, I haven't noticed any extra wear or problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure about the product, we received it a couple days late which was a Christmas present and when it arrived the box was damaged then when we took the grill out the top was completely bent in. It was so damaged I'm not sure a malet will be able to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: tabatha tillman

customer_reviews.title: Very slick looking grill. However, you can't use ...
customer_reviews.text: Very slick looking grill. However, you can't use a lot of charcoal and its hard to keep the heat down.
customer_reviews.author: finaid

customer_reviews.title: Cannot go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: This grill took me 3 days to assemble... Once it was built I could not be happier... It is so beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Happy hubby!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the option to raise and lower the charcoal trays. We even added a new patio for it! Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This is a good grill, it is not a smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is a good grill, it is not a smoker. That being said I did try 2 put insulating tape around it but it got too hot and melted the insulation. May try again. Ribs, chicken, burgers, pork chops, veggies, even a pie have been really good.
customer_reviews.author: MissBehavin

customer_reviews.title: This thing looks amazing but does not seal at all
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks amazing but does not seal at all. It is very hard to control the temperature when it has so many areas for the air to get it. We were happier with our Weber dome.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Havent even cooked on it and Im disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cant blame this one on the delivery service. All parts were packaged inside the firebox so everything was damaged at factory. Firebox is warped so it will not seal correctly, Bracket for divider was warped and the ash tray needed straightening out. Now to deal with it or have to tear it back apart for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Jacbsswamp

customer_reviews.title: very easy to clean and to use
customer_reviews.text: Got this for fathers day and he is in love with this i think he love to BBQ mor then he loves me 😆no cons on this one
customer_reviews.author: Review Queen

customer_reviews.title: NO CONTROL
customer_reviews.text: Just seasoned the grill tonight and I realized that this grill will NOT shut down. Dampers leak too much to control temperature. THERE IS NO CONTROL. Been an hour 1/2 with top shut and both sides closed and still running 500 degrees! I will try to figure this grill out but it will need help.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Adams

customer_reviews.title: We love this. Set up took a little bit
customer_reviews.text: We love this. Set up took a little bit, 2-3 hours for one person who had never built a grill before. We love this as our first charcoal grill. It’s beautiful and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Grill
customer_reviews.text: We love this grill!! So easy to use, to clean, and it’s beautiful. It’s very affordable, and I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Birthday present for son
customer_reviews.text: He absolutely loves this grill. He grills almost everything and he said the first thing he did was grill some fish; he had been wanting to do that for a while. I assembled it; it did not throw itself together, but it was not difficult. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill
customer_reviews.text: I really like this grill so far. Have grilled on it 5 times in the last week. The only thing I can find wrong so far is the legs are thin and wobbly may and may not stand the test of time. I will be reinforcing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Master Grill
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, temperature control is perfect and materials are awesome. So happy with my grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This dual zone grill works GREAT! I just hope they keep making this charcoal ...
customer_reviews.text: I've read all the reviews and some of them horrifying but with that aside. Received the box undamaged, no parts missing and yes I had to tight some screws and nuts. I had one problem, I called them and had the part with in 4 days. This dual zone grill works GREAT! I just hope they keep making this charcoal grill because I would reorder. Thanks again Smoking Tom
customer_reviews.author: TCS

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed customers!!!
customer_reviews.text: When assembled I noticed lid and ash pan were misaligned that's when I noticed damage to the frame in two places with chipped paint.the tabs for divider were bent completely over,hinges were bent.straight. everything out,but lid and ash pan still misaligned by 1 inch. Very disappointed! Anyone know how to adjust it if at all possible!
customer_reviews.author: Randy P Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for about three years and it still looks good. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill!
customer_reviews.text: Putting this together was a real job. Don't even try to put it together without a friend to help. Aside from that, it's a fantastic grill. Sturdy and easy to clean. We love the split adjustable coal trays.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for price
customer_reviews.text: I like that this grill has side by side areas for grilling. Indirect heat cooking works great. Heavy duty grill with good assembly directions
customer_reviews.author: AmyVinson

customer_reviews.title: ... tells an accurate temp as it went to 400 like a few others have said
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the thermometer tells an accurate temp as it went to 400 like a few others have said, but I made the best ribs and chicken I ever have with this grill using offset heat. It's big enough for me to have done 2 racks of ribs, a beef roast and 7 chicken quarters on only half the grill.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Klimeck

customer_reviews.title: GRILLING NON STOP
customer_reviews.text: We us this grill 90% of the time for cooking .. My husband loves this I love this no other grill can top this one.. You can cook 2 different things at 2 different temperatures .. Worth the $$$$$ Best part was no cost for shipping product was easy to put together. Steel love it this will last which makes spending the $$$ for it soooooo WORTH IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Love the split sections for different levels of heat!
customer_reviews.text: This grill is worth its weight!! I am a charcoal griller, and this is perfect with two zones so that I can regulate the sides. Instructions were very detailed and easy to follow. I will be using this all summer long!
customer_reviews.author: Zeornee

customer_reviews.title: Product came with incorrect parts
customer_reviews.text: Our grill came with two identical front fuel doors. The product is supposed to come with mirrored doors. I will update if I am able to get help from customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Beat up box, item was a return
customer_reviews.text: We did NOT know we would be receiving a previously returned item, hence some of the bolts were missing. (Good thing I had a back up bag of bolts) We did know that the box was damaged previous to receiving. The item itself needed some tweaking. Bent in places and the lid didn't match up. The back was unattached where it should be attached, so I JB Welded it. Not sure how that is gonna hold up. Overall, we got it at such a discount price that none of this was much of a big deal. It is yet to be determined how the cooking will go. Will be testing that out this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Fipps

customer_reviews.title: Great material!
customer_reviews.text: We love to cook with charcoal and this is the perfect grill for that! Had everything needed to assemble. Rolls smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY!!!
customer_reviews.text: We were highly disappointed because after almost being done with building the grill. We realized that it had a manufactured damage! They did not make a hole for the Thermometer on top of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Ariela Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Dyna Glo grill
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grill. Upon researching, decided to purchase this. You can grill a whole meal on this. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Schiattone

customer_reviews.title: Cannot handle rain water
customer_reviews.text: This bbq fills up with rain water every time it rains. When I pull out the ash tray it gets all over the place from water. Otherwise not a bad product for money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift for gas grill fans
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this grill. I bought it as a (very) early gift for the hubby, and he's been using it every weekend for a month now. It gets the job done perfectly, and clean up is super easy. Shipped faster than expected, came compact, and was pretty easy to put together - it took the two of us about 45 minutes altogether. (In the dark I might add, that's how excited he was!)
customer_reviews.author: happymommy

customer_reviews.title: dyna glo charcoal grill
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a house warming gift for my mother. She loves it. Now I just need to get to her house so she can cook me a meal on it lol. No issues at all was easy to put together per my brothers.
customer_reviews.author: luvher74

customer_reviews.title: Great find and buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Went together easily, break-in was a snap. I was looking for a system that would be easy to operate over a long period of grill time, be able to handle a large, varied amount of food. First use was great... ribs, Salmon, burgers and brats... whole affair was over about four hours... all worked well. I will need to perform some modifications to put a rotisserie on the unit, but Dina-Glow states it can be done...
customer_reviews.author: MerylStreep Wannabe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made, this grill delivers dual temperature control as advertised. Bbq chicken was temp was consistent throughout, beef brisket nicely finished on outside but still juicy and pink inside. Veggies were easy to grill to desired degree. No more burnt dinners!
customer_reviews.author: Pugmother

customer_reviews.title: Dads favorite gift
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful grill. My brother put it together for my dad. He loves it. Cooks beautifully. Love the stainless steel and the easy to change the charcoal. Very ideal for my dad who has MS.
customer_reviews.author: Antionette R. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Very good packaging and excellent directions
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Very good packaging and excellent directions! Took about 1 1/12 hours to put together and looks terrific! Only complaint is the tool that comes in the "kit " is useless! My husband had to break into his own tools to construct it properly! Great grill, nice quality and fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: augswife

customer_reviews.title: Good for the most part
customer_reviews.text: For the most part it is a great grill. When we put it together it had a gap on one side and now a year later it has rust on some of the grill itself and mold on the platform
customer_reviews.author: Dione

customer_reviews.title: Love our new grill
customer_reviews.text: We love our new grill, perfect for family get togethers. The grill top is large and easy to clean. The doors in the front and the mechanism to raise and lower the charcoal make it easy to control the temperature. The grill is sturdy and well made, should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Don't do it...Way too much air/draft; you can't really control the cooking temperature.Front center doors are real drafty, poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Pantelleria

customer_reviews.title: Had a dent in the grill
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived today it had a dent in the grill itself on the corner didn’t notice until I was about halfway done putting together and one of the screws had a piece of plastic or something in the top of it so I couldn’t use it cause I couldn’t get it out
customer_reviews.author: James Roubison

customer_reviews.title: Missing several pieces
customer_reviews.text: The grill is not bad if you can get through assembly. Received the package and had 10 parts missing! I was easily able to get replacement parts through customer service but very annoying to have that many parts missing from the original package.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jones Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Great grill, granddaughters helped put it together. 12 & 14.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Zylph

customer_reviews.title: Poor Material
customer_reviews.text: After the very first use, the metal plates in the back and bottom have warped already. With high usage, this grill will not last one year. If you want it to last, you have add SS plates to the back and bottom of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Odisho

customer_reviews.title: bought as a present and shipped out of state, ...
customer_reviews.text: bought as a present and shipped out of state, large dent in the hood, giftee did not want to return, loves the grill
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful, well built grill
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, well built grill! They also have great customer service. We will try an after market rotisserie with it, a feature I hope they make available in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Flexible cooker?
customer_reviews.text: The item was easy to assemble. The flexibility to use 2 different levels of heat or even one side for smaller meals really works as described. We will use this grill many times for many years. We highly recommend this grill if you are a charcoal griller.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: We've used it several times and really love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for hubby. We've used it several times and really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Loki

customer_reviews.title: SUPER
customer_reviews.text: SUPER quality. I'd never heard of Dyna-Glo but bought this to replace a Weber kettle. VERY pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Frensley

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had was with the first used the stainless steel turning dark color.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Knight

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised. Unit was easy to assemble. Cooks great.
customer_reviews.author: Rc

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Like two grills in one. Use one side for small meals and both sides for large get togethers. Assembly was a breeze. Quality construction. Money well and happily spent.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Cheap grill. Parts needed to be modified to assemble the grill. The front doors are very hard to open and shut. Charcoal tray does not slide easily. Some screws will not set, very rickety.
customer_reviews.author: RC Johnson LLC

customer_reviews.title: and really like the features of this grill
customer_reviews.text: Have used the grill several times now and even once used it to smoke a pork tenderloin, and really like the features of this grill. It would have gotten 5 stars if the grill vents, and lid sealed better to better control the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to raise/lower heat source. Easy loading and great to be able to use large or small area. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ribbitt

customer_reviews.title: awesome charcoal grill
customer_reviews.text: awesome charcoal grill. on 3 rd season now, looking ok, a little weather. i think it would last a very long time had i covered during winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love our new grill!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the grill for over a month now and love everything about it! Made well, sturdy frame and structurally sound. The grill is easy to clean and easy to use. Very efficient heat and cooks great! I would buy this grill again and again, but probably not for a long while because the grill is made so good.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great charcoal grill
customer_reviews.text: Gets amazingly hot and have great control over temperature. Used for steak, burgers, veggies, ribs and sausage and very pleased with results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: Like the ability to adjust the height of the charcoal for proper heat. Takes 1 1/2 hours to assemble, but the instructions were very easy to follow. Awesome Grill for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Louis S.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: It takes time to get going but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Crowl

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.  Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made. But what isn’t these days. Assembled with ease. Only issue is it doesn’t seal up nicely. Air gaps like crazy. Extremely difficult to keep lower temps.
customer_reviews.author: david singleton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Charcoal Grill
customer_reviews.text: Luv this grill! Front doors allows you to add various woods, side vents as well as smoke stack, different degrees of cooking depending on where you place your charcoal grates, up to 700 degrees cooking tempts and stainless steel make for an excellent charcoal grill. I am very happy with my grill. Make sure you buy a cover for yours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I like that you can adjust the coals. Used 4 times already. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: madsam0an

customer_reviews.title: The stainless steel looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to control temperature. I cooked skirt steak next to shrimp and salmon. Clean up is as simple as in any other grill. I was able to assemble it in 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Delta2424

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill but...
customer_reviews.text: Minor lid damage due to inadequate packaging also one of the mounting brackets was misaligned and due to that the bolt ended up getting cross-threaded. Otherwise the fuction of the grill is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Turk

product_meta.title: Dyna-Glo DGN576SNC-D Dual Zone Premium Charcoal Grill, X-Large, Stainless
product_meta.description: Style:Premium GrillCooking with charcoal is now stylish and functional with this dual chamber, stainless Dyna-Glo charcoal grill. The removable steel firebox divider allows for expanding or dividing the cooking space depending on the amount and type of food and total number of people. The two charcoal trays adjust separately to provide flexibility with cooking temperature when different foods require different temperatures at the same time. The lid and front firebox are double-walled to minimize heat loss and improve the burn efficiency of charcoal. The high capacity ash pan is removable for quick and easy clean-up.
feature_bullets: Removable firebox divider for single or dual cooking zone
Primary cooking area is 576 square inches
Secondary cooking area is 240 square inches
TOTAL cooking area is 816 square inches
Protect your grill with a custom-fit Dyna-Glo premium cover - Model # DG576CC (Sold Separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars539 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
